item.title: Cronos: The New Dawn physical edition announced for PS5
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/cronos-the-new-dawn-physical-edition-announced-for-ps5

  • PS5

Distributed by Skybound Games.

Skybound Games will distribute a physical edition of third-person survival horror game Cronos: The New Dawn for PlayStation 5 in the Americas, developer Bloober Team announced.

“Skybound is a partner with exceptional competences in the field of global game distribution (it was responsible for the physical release of The Calisto Protocol, among others),” said Bloober Team CEO Piotr Babieno in a press release. “We are glad that we can develop this partnership with Cronos: The New Dawn. This is our strongest original title and we know that it will be another big step in the development of the Bloober Team Group. Boxed distribution is an important element of our distribution strategy and marketing mix.”

Cronos: The New Dawn is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store this fall.
